titleStmt.title: A true relation of the gelding of a lascivious Franciscan-fryer on board the exchange-frigat by the boatswains boy : as it came in a letter to a merchant in London from Leghorn, dated Octob. 18/28.
titleStmt.author: J. M.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Richard Janeway ...,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; place of publication suggested by Wing.
